OrgName: TripCase, a division of Sabre GLBL Inc.
activities: TripCase, through its web-based or mobile application, uses personal information of European travelers to provide those travelers with the ability to integrate all of their trip-related information into one location, share information regarding their trips, and receive informational updates and deals related to their trips.
contacttitle1: Associate General Counsel & Director of Privacy
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal data about European travelers processed through TripCase's web-based or mobile application
recoursemech: International Centre for Dispute Resolution, a division of the American Arbitration Association, Safe Harbor Program (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program)
